00046 // internal macro, usage: EVCB.beginSend(...)
00047 #define EVCB  ev.suppress_notifications ? (void)0 : ev

00067 #define ev  (*cSimulation::getActiveEnvir())

00084 #define EV  ev.isDisabled()?ev:ev   /*Note: deliberately NO parens*/

00101 class SIM_API cEnvir
00102 {
00103     friend class evbuf;
00104   public:
00105     // Internal flag for express mode.
00106     bool disable_tracing;
00107 
00108     // Indicates whether eventlog recording is currently enabled
00109     bool record_eventlog;
00110 
00111     // Internal flag. When set to true, the simulation kernel MAY omit calling
00112     // the following cEnvir methods: messageScheduled(), messageCancelled(),
00113     // beginSend(), messageSendDirect(), messageSendHop(), messageSendHop(),
00114     // messageSendHop(), messageDeleted(), moduleReparented(), simulationEvent(),
00115     // componentMethodBegin(), moduleCreated(), moduleDeleted(), connectionCreated(),
00116     // connectionDeleted(), displayStringChanged().
00117     bool suppress_notifications;
00118 
00119     // Internal flag. When set, cRuntimeError constructor to raises an exception.
00120     bool debug_on_errors;
00121 
00122   protected:
00123     // further internal vars
00124     std::ostream out;
00125 
00126   protected:
00127     // internal: ev.printf() and ev<< eventually ends up here; write the first n characters of string s
00128     virtual void sputn(const char *s, int n) = 0;
00129 
00130     // internal: pop up a dialog with the given message; called from printfmsg()
00131     virtual void putsmsg(const char *msg) = 0;
00132 
00133     // internal: ask a yes/no question, throws exception if cancelled; askYesNo() delegates here
00134     virtual bool askyesno(const char *msg) = 0;
00135 
00136     // internal: flushes the internal stream buffer by terminating last line if needed
00137     void flushLastLine();
00138 
00139   public:
00142 
00146     cEnvir();
00147 
00151     virtual ~cEnvir();
00153 
00156 
00163     // note: this cannot be pure virtual, because it has to work even after ev was disposed of
00164     virtual void objectDeleted(cObject *object) {}
00165 
00169     virtual void componentInitBegin(cComponent *component, int stage) {}
00170 
00178     virtual void simulationEvent(cMessage *msg) = 0;
00179 
00193     virtual void messageSent_OBSOLETE(cMessage *msg, cGate *directToGate=NULL) = 0;
00194 
00199     virtual void messageScheduled(cMessage *msg) = 0;
00200 
00205     virtual void messageCancelled(cMessage *msg) = 0;
00206 
00214     virtual void beginSend(cMessage *msg) = 0;
00215 
00217     virtual void messageSendDirect(cMessage *msg, cGate *toGate, simtime_t propagationDelay, simtime_t transmissionDelay) = 0;
00218 
00220     virtual void messageSendHop(cMessage *msg, cGate *srcGate) = 0;
00221 
00223     virtual void messageSendHop(cMessage *msg, cGate *srcGate, simtime_t propagationDelay, simtime_t transmissionDelay) = 0;
00224 
00226     virtual void endSend(cMessage *msg) = 0;
00227 
00233     virtual void messageDeleted(cMessage *msg) = 0;
00234 
00238     virtual void moduleReparented(cModule *module, cModule *oldparent) = 0;
00239 
00246     virtual void componentMethodBegin(cComponent *from, cComponent *to, const char *methodFmt, va_list va, bool silent) = 0;
00247 
00252     virtual void componentMethodEnd() = 0;
00253 
00259     virtual void moduleCreated(cModule *newmodule) = 0;
00260 
00272     virtual void moduleDeleted(cModule *module) = 0;
00273 
00277     virtual void gateCreated(cGate *newgate) = 0;
00278 
00283     virtual void gateDeleted(cGate *gate) = 0;
00284 
00289     virtual void connectionCreated(cGate *srcgate) = 0;
00290 
00295     virtual void connectionDeleted(cGate *srcgate) = 0;
00296 
00301     virtual void displayStringChanged(cComponent *component) = 0;
00302 
00307     // Note: this may not be pure virtual, as it may get called even after main()
00308     // exited and StaticEnv was destructed, and we do not want to get a "pure virtual
00309     // method called" error
00310     virtual void undisposedObject(cObject *obj) {}
00312 
00315 
00321     virtual void configure(cComponent *component) = 0;
00322 
00327     virtual void readParameter(cPar *parameter) = 0;
00328 
00338     virtual bool isModuleLocal(cModule *parentmod, const char *modname, int index) = 0;
00339 
00361     virtual cXMLElement *getXMLDocument(const char *filename, const char *path=NULL) = 0;
00362 
00375     virtual void forgetXMLDocument(const char *filename) = 0;
00376 
00385     virtual void flushXMLDocumentCache() = 0;
00386 
00391     virtual unsigned getExtraStackForEnvir() const = 0;
00392 
00400     virtual cConfiguration *getConfig() = 0;
00401 
00407     virtual cConfigurationEx *getConfigEx();
00409 
00417     virtual bool isGUI() const = 0;
00418 
00434     bool isDisabled() const {return disable_tracing && !record_eventlog;}
00435 
00440     // implementation note: needed because otherwise the templated version
00441     // would cause ambiguity errors in some cases
00442     cEnvir& operator<<(const std::string& t) {out << t; return *this;}
00443 
00455     template<typename T> cEnvir& operator<<(const T& t) {out << t; return *this;}
00456 
00460     cEnvir& operator<<(std::ostream& (t)(std::ostream&)) {out << t; return *this;}
00461 
00466     std::ostream& getOStream() {return out;}
00467 
00472     virtual void bubble(cComponent *component, const char *text) = 0;
00473 
00478     virtual void printfmsg(const char *fmt,...);
00479 
00490     // note: non-virtual, delegates to sputn()
00491     virtual int printf(const char *fmt,...);
00492 
00499     virtual cEnvir& flush() = 0;
00500 
00504     virtual std::string gets(const char *prompt, const char *defaultreply=NULL) = 0;
00505 
00511     // note: non-virtual, delegates to askyesno()
00512     virtual bool askYesNo(const char *fmt,...);
00514 
00517 
00522     virtual int getNumRNGs() const = 0;
00523 
00527     virtual cRNG *getRNG(int k) = 0;
00528 
00533     virtual void getRNGMappingFor(cComponent *component) = 0;
00535 
00545 
00553     virtual void *registerOutputVector(const char *modulename, const char *vectorname) = 0;
00554 
00558     virtual void deregisterOutputVector(void *vechandle) = 0;
00559 
00563     virtual void setVectorAttribute(void *vechandle, const char *name, const char *value) = 0;
00564 
00570     virtual bool recordInOutputVector(void *vechandle, simtime_t t, double value) = 0;
00572 
00582 
00586     virtual void recordScalar(cComponent *component, const char *name, double value, opp_string_map *attributes=NULL) = 0;
00587 
00592     virtual void recordStatistic(cComponent *component, const char *name, cStatistic *statistic, opp_string_map *attributes=NULL) = 0;
00594 
00602 
00606     virtual std::ostream *getStreamForSnapshot() = 0;
00607 
00611     virtual void releaseStreamForSnapshot(std::ostream *os) = 0;
00613 
00619     virtual int getArgCount() const = 0;
00620 
00624     virtual char **getArgVector() const = 0;
00625 
00629     virtual int getParsimProcId() const = 0;
00630 
00635     virtual int getParsimNumPartitions() const = 0;
00636 
00640     virtual unsigned long getUniqueNumber() = 0;
00641 
00655     virtual bool idle() = 0;
00657 };

00667 class SIM_API cRunnableEnvir : public cEnvir
00668 {
00669   public:
00674     virtual int run(int argc, char *argv[], cConfiguration *cfg) = 0;
